title: FS: T206/T205 Scrapbook: Cobb, WaJo, Matty - Sold
author: Webster

posts.post_title: FS: T206/T205 Scrapbook: Cobb, WaJo, Matty - Sold
posts.post_content:
FS:  An unusual scrapbook page loaded with HOFers.

Cards are firmly affixed to both sides - about 55 in all with a dozen HOFers - with some great images.

T206s include: Cobb - Bat Off, Johnson Pitching, Young Portrait, Marquard Portrait, Huggins, Bender, Bresnahan Batting, and what appears to be a very rare Chase with Trophy AB 460.

T205s include: Johnson, Mathewson, Speaker, and Chance.

Please PM with regular email for full set of scans.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=172040&d=1419206136[/IMG]

Pm sent


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk HD

How much is this item?

Thanks! mike
I'd like to know, too; thanks.
